summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEssence Hydra Kiss Lip Oil provides intense hydration and adds a high-gloss finish with a hint of color for a stunning pout!
details: DetailsFeaturesProvides shine and moisture to the lipsProvides a hint of color to the lipsInfused with hyaluronic acid, jojoba oil, vitamin E, and meadowfoam oilNon-sticky formulaNourishes and hydrates lipsCruelty freeFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productsGlutenMicroplastic particlesParabensItem 2618295How To UseUsing the doe foot applicator, apply essence Hydra Kiss Lip Oil to the lips. Wear alone for a natural sheen or pair with your favorite essence lipstick for a full glam look!IngredientsDiisostearyl Malate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polyisobutene, Silica, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glyceryl Behenate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene. May Contain: CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6 Lake).
how_to_use: Using the doe foot applicator, apply essence Hydra Kiss Lip Oil to the lips. Wear alone for a natural sheen or pair with your favorite essence lipstick for a full glam look!

reviews.headline: Lip oil
reviews.comments: Love this lip oil very hydrating and tastes good too love this essence line üëçüëçüëç

reviews.headline: I love it!!!
reviews.comments: The BEST!!!

reviews.headline: Love Love Love
reviews.comments: I bought the clear one. Super nice texture, has a very nice and clean smell. Amazed by the formula leave your lips with a glassy look and would definitely purchase again

reviews.headline: It's whatever
reviews.comments: More of a lip gloss than a lip oil.. probably wont buy again.. nothing wrong with it, just not what i was looking for.

reviews.headline: Back to the lab!!!
reviews.comments:
To start off with, it's an affordable lip oil. Lets be honest here that lip oils dont have to be $15+ let alone $10 or more. The color is cute though! 

It's truly not bad the formula, but theres not enough product in this giant packaging! I purchased this a couple days ago and it's almost out. 

I dont like that their ingredient, it contains Red40, Lake Blue 5, and Lake Yellow 6. I understand in America it's very difficult to avoid these ingredients so you're welcome that I checked if youre avoiding it like me. 

The formula is nice but it doesn't last and it can be drying. I noticed if I apply something moisturizing like aquaphor before hand, it won't dry out my lips.

reviews.headline: Do not waste your money
reviews.comments: Dont waist your money on this product. It burned my lips (and I dont have sensitive skin), the color didnt show up/in the shade I got the color settles at the bottom, and it is very thick and gloopy.

reviews.headline: HAWT
reviews.comments: I got it in the color Midnight Mystery, such a lovely color. I am in love with this plum blackish color. It wears well on its own and holds a bit of color but also looks gorgeous layered on top of a lipliner. BUT there isn't a lot of product so maybe buy 2 lol

reviews.headline: New fav
reviews.comments: I trued this for the first time and i love it! Has the perfect consistency..leaves a great shine on the lips and lasts a few hours which is good for a gloss. Ive tried lots of glosses and this is my top 3 for sure

reviews.headline: Luscious
reviews.comments: Amazing!!!

reviews.headline: I would not recommend this‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I bought the orange shade a year ago and i put this into my purse and it leaked all over. I would not call rhis a lip oul or a gloss. Its kind of feels like a lip tint but way thicker. The color is cute but i would not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Would not buy
reviews.comments: Essence brand has good products but this lip oil isnt good. Dont like how it smells, it ferls weird on lips. Color is nothing spectacular

reviews.headline: Color changing is so vibrant and it lasts!
reviews.comments: I love it and it's definitely one I'll repurchase

reviews.headline: Nice but not an oil
reviews.comments: I like this lip GLOSS. It id definitely thick and not an oil! I have the Honey, honey that was a GWP. It has no color, very little scent and I don't taste anything either. I like how it feels on thick but comfortable and the shine is great. Some have said it's sticky...if you apply to much it could be but you'll get more shine too. I applied lightly and pressed my hair to my lips not even a single hair stayed. It's not my HG but it's a solid product at a great price. I have products I prefer but they are much more expensive, in a pinch I would purchase this though.

reviews.headline: looks great, feels not so great
reviews.comments: i love the way it looks! but the smell is pretty unpleasant and it's very sticky, it does not feel like a lip oil at all. it's not worth the hassle of returning since it's so cheap, but i wouldn't buy it again.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: The pink color it perfect and very hydrating. I love how big the applicator is!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This is a great product with a good shine and finish for your lips. Loved everything about this lip oil beside it being a bit sticky but otherwise would buy again.

reviews.headline: Love this lip oil
reviews.comments: I got the orange üçä it's awesome. Love so smooth on the lips great product

reviews.headline: Obsessed with the Essence Lip Oil
reviews.comments: Leaves my lips so soft and glossy without feeling sticky. Super hydrating and perfect for everyday wear‚Äîplus, you can't beat the price!

reviews.headline: Great product but not enough
reviews.comments: This was a great product and an AMAZING dupe of the nyx lip oil, but for the price I wish there was some more product because it only lasted me about a mounth

reviews.headline: My go to for shine & gloss
reviews.comments: I received it as a free gift with my purchase and loved it so much decided to buy more of it ! I like to wear lipstick first and then add the lip oil over it for that glossy look and the combo is perfect! The oil itself is not sticky and feels light on my lips!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was looking to try something new and came across this product. When it comes to anything with lips, I stick to products that are moisturinzing since I have full lips. I was skeptical of this product due to it stating it was an "oil." When I think of oil, I think of something that's thin and just sits on top of your lips and doesn't hydrate them at all. I took the plunge to purchase this anyway and BOY I'M GLAD I GOT THIS PRODUCT! :) It feels so good on my lips and surprisingly the consistency is much thicker than an oil. It's really like an actual lip gloss texture and too hydrating on my lips even after it wears off.

I would totally recommend this product if that's what you're looking for! :)
faceoff_positive.headline: Really Like This But NOT A Lip Oil!

faceoff_negative.comments: I got the honey honey shade. I typically like to go for a more orange shade with lip oils since they don't show up crazy pigmented with my pale complexion. I do not like the smell if you are into baby powder then this is for you. Sometimes when I apply it is so smooth and gorgeous looking, and other times it feels bumpy/gritty but still looks good but I cannot stand the feeling on my lips. the applicator has a hard/rough spot which does not feel pleasant while applying to the lips. It feels like something is scratching me. Not enough product as well! I've only had since last Monday and I am already more than halfway through the tube which is upsetting. usually a good lip oil will last much longer than 2 weeks. overall I am disappointed in this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: it's OKay
